sentence.Network_en: When we sing or play a fortissimo passage it must be controlled.
sentence.Network_cn: 当我们唱或弹出一段很强的乐曲,它必须是有好的控制.

sentence.Network_en: A walking bass theme thuds heavily ( pesante ) and fortissimo out of the silence following the Scherzo.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个漫步式的低音主题沉重地敲击着,以最强音打破了谐谑曲结束后的安静.

sentence.Network_en: Strings and woodwind steadily wander the said extensive third theme, attaining at last fortissimo.
sentence.Network_cn: 弦乐和木管乐器有规则地徘徊于广阔的第三主题, 在最后奏出一段最强音.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 求一些艺术类法语词汇！_百度知道 ... forte 强 fortissimo 很强 forte fortissimo 最强.
标示极强(fortissimo),但不是未经思考的拉奏,而是以极为宽广地,庄重地 (largamente) 表现出来,之后独奏大提琴以E小调属音B开始,将E.
...全奏,很快就到达乐曲的高潮.这是《水星》中唯一的特强音(fortissimo).高潮降下之后,又回到了起始时无休止的音乐,然后变成了伊莫 …
fortis 强音fortissimo 非常嘹亮的fortitude 坚毅

list.abs: ...fortissimo〔意〕很强。简记为??。作曲家为强调力度，有时还用???直至????。见附表二。fortissimo quanto possibile〔意〕尽可能强。fortsetzend〔德〕继续进行的，重新开始的。.
在布拉格黄昏的广场　(moderato andantino portmento fortissimo)
...feurig〔德〕如火的，火热的，热情洋溢的。ff fortissimo之简记，见附表二。fiaccamente〔意〕微弱地，衰弱下去地。.
...feurig〔德〕如火的，火热的，热情洋溢的。ff fortissimo之简记，见附表二。fiaccamente〔意〕微弱地，衰弱下去地。.

entry.def: A piece of music that is played fortissimo is played very loudly.

means.word_mean: 1. chiefly a direction or description in music
1. a direction in music; to be played very loudly

auth_sentence.content: "You will feel the fortissimo in your body," says one engineer.
auth_sentence.res_content: "You will feel the fortissimo in your body," says one engineer.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "You will feel the fortissimo in your body," says one engineer.
